description: This table contains timeliness information for authorization request milestones.

columns.name: AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the authorization request record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: PROV_WRITTEN_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received written notification of a decision.

columns.name: PROV_ORAL_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received oral notification of a decision.

columns.name: MEM_WRITTEN_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received written notification of a decision.

columns.name: MEM_ORAL_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received oral notification of a decision.

columns.name: REP_WRITTEN_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received written notification of a decision.

columns.name: REP_ORAL_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received oral notification of a decision.

columns.name: PROV_WRITTEN_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received written notification of an extension.

columns.name: PROV_ORAL_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received oral notification of an extension.

columns.name: MEM_WRITTEN_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received written notification of an extension.

columns.name: MEM_ORAL_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received oral notification of an extension.

columns.name: REP_WRITTEN_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received written notification of an extension.

columns.name: REP_ORAL_NOTIF_EXT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received oral notification of an extension.

columns.name: PROV_WRITTEN_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received written notification of a denial to expedite.

columns.name: PROV_ORAL_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the provider first received oral notification of a denial to expedite.

columns.name: MEM_WRITTEN_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received written notification of a denial to expedite.

columns.name: MEM_ORAL_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the member first received oral notification of a denial to expedite.

columns.name: REP_WRITTEN_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received written notification of a denial to expedite.

columns.name: REP_ORAL_DNL_EXP_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time (local) that the authorized representative first received oral notification of a denial to expedite.
